tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WarehouseCapacity (
  warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  warehouse_name VARCHAR(255),
  total_capacity INT,
  available_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE warehouse_capacity (
  warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  warehouse_location VARCHAR(100),
  total_capacity INT,
  available_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_data (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  quantity_in_stock INT,
  unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE warehouses (
    warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_capacity INT,
    used_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    warehouse_id INT,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity_available INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE InventoryData (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    warehouse_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES WarehouseCapacity(warehouse_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Allocation (
    allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    quantity_allocated INT NOT NULL,
    allocation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES InventoryData(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionStatus (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    production_date DATE NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES InventoryData(item_id)
);
CREATE TABLE resources_capacity (  warehouse_id INT,  warehouse_name VARCHAR(255),  capacity INT,  PRIMARY KEY (warehouse_id) );

CREATE TABLE inventory_data (  product_id INT,  product_name VARCHAR(255),  quantity INT,  warehouse_id INT,  FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES resources_capacity(warehouse_id),  PRIMARY KEY (product_id, warehouse_id) );
CREATE TABLE warehouse_location (  warehouse_id INT,  location VARCHAR(255),  PRIMARY KEY (warehouse_id) );
CREATE TABLE product_categories (  category_id INT,  category_name VARCHAR(255),  PRIMARY KEY (category_id) );

CREATE TABLE warehouse_inventory_status (  warehouse_id INT,  product_id INT,  inventory_status VARCHAR(50),  FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES resources_capacity(warehouse_id),  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES inventory_data(product_id),  PRIMARY KEY (warehouse_id, product_id) );
